about.about: I am Mohammadreza Haghshenas (Mohammadrezahq), was born in Tehran/Iran on 2002. I am A Laravel developer who started web developing in 2014 with HTML/CSS & PHP. In 2016 I started learning PHP MVC, WordPress theme development concurrently with Laravel framework development. Because of working with pure PHP and WordPress, I work on both front and back (front with HTML 5/CSS 3/SCSS/jQuery). In 2021, I have started learning Vue js.
about.gaming: Gaming: Most of the time 'CS GO'

projects.lymedia: Social media like instagram based on Laravel 8, Vue js V3 and MongoDB
projects.messenger: Real-time messenger app with Laravel, Vue js, MySQL and pusher
projects.wisham: An app with Laravel and Vue for listing wishes
projects.todoapp: Todo desktop app with vue js and electron js
